name: Lycanthropy
description:
Title: Lycanthropy

Platform: Computer, .html

Genre: Text-Adventure

Rating: E (10+)

Target Market: Adventure game players

Game Overview:

Lycanthropy is a text-adventure game where you will have to fight back the werewolf force that ravages the town. You won't be on your own, of course; you'll get some advice from your father, Dr. Fang, along the way. Twists and turns lurk around every corner. Can you successfully defeat the lycanthrope armada? Or will the ferocious creatures bring about your demise--or worse, make you one of them?

Instructions:

Just download the HTML file and play!

Game Design Team:

Jonah Brandenburgh - Game Designer
